title: The Adventures of Alice Evans: Super Consultant

story.text: Alice Evans, a seasoned 65-year-old consultant, discovers a mysterious pen that imbues her with the power to see the future of any business she consults for. She decides to test her new abilities at a struggling local bakery.
Using her foresight, Alice suggests specific changes to the bakery's operations. Her advice leads to a record sale day. News of her success starts to spread throughout the city.
Alice is invited by a tech startup facing difficulties. With her visionary power, she helps restructure their business model, setting them on a path to recovery and innovation.
The mayor, hearing of her accomplishments, asks for her help to revitalize the city's failing public transportation system. She works tirelessly to draft a new, efficient, and cost-effective plan.

Her plan is implemented, and the city’s transportation becomes more effective. People are starting to call her 'Super Consultant'. Her story makes it to the local news as the city celebrates her achievements.
As her fame grows, Alice stays humble, offering free consulting for non-profits. She uses her powers to generate solutions for homeless shelters, improving their operations and outreach.
Alice takes a well-deserved break, reflecting on her week. At a park, a child recognizes her from the news and runs up to thank her, saying her parents’ jobs were saved by Alice’s consulting work.

ending: As the sun sets, Alice realizes that her greatest power was always her desire to help others.
moral: True heroes are those who use their talents to make a difference in the lives of others.
